metadata.title: Erowid Naltrexone Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Naltrexone.

content:
Drug: Naltrexone | cid: 5360515
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Naltrexone.
Erowid name: naltrexone
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    ("Share Your Story" link. Needs quick login creation but no verification of contact info)

Naltrexone

Legal Status

by Erowid

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #

Caution : All legal information should be verified through other sources. [see below]

U.S. FEDERAL LEGAL SUMMARY Naltrexone REGULATED Yes STATUS Prescription Only SCHEDULE Un-Scheduled

Naltrexone is unscheduled in the United States, but is available by prescription only. This means that sales and distribution are allowed only by those with a license and only to those with a prescription (according to FDA regulations). Possession is not illegal even without a prescription.

INTERNATIONAL LAW #

Canada #

Naltrexone is specifically excluded from the list of opiates in schedule I in Canada (along with apopmorphine, cyprenorphine, nalmefene, naloxone, narcotine, papaverine, and poppy seed). (thanks F)

If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #


                    Context: 
                    This section provides detailed information about the legal status of naltrexone, a pharmaceutical drug, at both the U.S. federal level and in Canada, including its prescription requirements and scheduling. It is part of a broader informational resource on psychoactive substances, with emphasis on regulatory status, legal considerations, and disclaimers about the accuracy and scope of the legal data provided.

                    Text: 
                    If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid legal information is a summary of data gathered from site visitors, government documents, websites, and other resources. We are not lawyers and can not guarantee the accuracy of the information provided here. We do our best to keep this information correct and up-to-date, but laws are complex and constantly changing. Laws may also vary from one jurisdiction to another (county, state, country, etc)...this list is not comprehensive.
